member.summary: Class that gives some information about an SNMP client

member.summary: If a client is inactive for longer than ClientInactivityTime minutes then it is removed from the list

member.name: T:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpDictionary
member.summary: Collection with fast O(1) key-based lookup and fast O(log n) index-based lookup

member.summary: Gets a sorted list of all OIDs. This is a copy.

member.summary: Gets a list of all objects sorted by OID. This is a copy.

member.summary: Is used as a dictionary key

member.summary: This is how it appears in MIB file

member.summary: Helper function that performs synchronous retrieval of report and synchronous sending of inform v3

member.summary: Args for the generic 'message received' event

member.summary: Listening engine

member.summary: Collection of all SNMP objects

member.name: F:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp._protocolVersions
member.summary: Enabled SNMP protocol versions

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.WantToStart
member.summary: Whether user wants listening engine to be started. This flag is only used for Restart functionality. If it is true, then library will try to restart an engine if it was stopped due to some configuration changes. Use Start() and Stop() to control this flag.

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.DefaultLocalPortBase
member.summary: Default port for each iba product is calculated based on this value

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.NotificationList
member.summary: List of notifications: Traps or Inform Requests

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.Logger
member.summary: Optional external logger, can be set to null if not required

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.LoggingMessageReceivedEnabled
member.summary: Whether to log each 'message received' or not.

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.OidMib2System
member.summary: 1.3.6.1.2.1.1 = {iso(1) identified-organization(3) dod(6) internet(1) mgmt(2) mib-2(1) system(1)}

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.OidMib2SystemDescr
member.summary: system.1.0 - A textual description of the entity

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.OidMib2SystemObjectId
member.summary: system.2.0 - vendor's identification of the contained entity

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.OidMib2SystemUpTime
member.summary: system.3.0 - time since node was last re-initialized

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.OidMib2SystemContact
member.summary: system.4.0 - contact person

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.OidMib2SystemName
member.summary: system.5.0 - node's fully-qualified domain name

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.OidMib2SystemLocation
member.summary: system.6.0 - physical location of this node

member.summary: 1.3.6.1.4.1.45120 - The root of iba data

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetListOfAllOids
member.summary: Gets a copy of a sorted list of OIDs for all existing SNMP objects

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetListOfAllObjects
member.summary: Gets a copy of a list of all existing SNMP objects sorted by OID

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.CreateGenericSnmpObjects
member.summary: Create objects with special meaning and handling.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.CreateEupObjectsIfNotYetExist
member.summary: Checks whether EUP objects exist and if not then creates them.

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ConnectionUseIPv4
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether engine should support IPv4 endpoints. If no, IPv6 listners will not be created. Default is true. Be sure to set at least one of properties 'ConnectionUseIPv4' or 'ConnectionUseIPv4' to true, before starting an agent.

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ConnectionUseIPv6
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether engine should support IPv6 endpoints. If no, IPv6 listners will not be created. Default is true. Be sure to set at least one of properties 'ConnectionUseIPv4' or 'ConnectionUseIPv4' to true, before starting an agent.

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.EndPointsToListen
member.summary: Gets a copy of a list or sets a list of EndPoints to Listen. (Returning a copy instead of an internal list is an intended behavior. Because engine should be restarted on the case of endpoint change)

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ActiveEndPoints
member.summary: Gets a copy of a subset of EndPointsToListen filtered depending on whether IPv4/v6 is enabled

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.RecalcActiveEndPoints
member.summary: Remove unsupported endpoints from the endpoint list

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.Restart
member.summary: Perform restart of listening engine. All the SNMP objects including user data are preserved.
member.remarks: Stop/Start engine if it is running, Just start it, if it is Stopped but _wantToStart == true, Do nothing, if it is Stopped and _wantToStart == false
member.returns: True if there was a try of restart, false if restart was cancelled because 'wantToStart' is false

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.Start
member.summary: Starts engine; i.e. starts listening. Sets WantToStart to true.
member.remarks: Can throw IbaSnmpIsBannedException, InvalidOperationException
member.returns: True if was started successfully, false if had beed already started

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.Stop
member.summary: Stops engine; i.e. stops listening; Sets WantToStart to false.
member.returns: True if was stopped successfully, false if had beed already stopped

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.StartEngine
member.summary: Starts engine; i.e. starts listening; (_wantToStart is not changed)
member.remarks: Can throw IbaSnmpIsBannedException, InvalidOperationException
member.returns: True if was started successfully, false if had beed already started

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.StopEngine
member.summary: Stops engine; i.e. stops listening; (_wantToStart is not changed)
member.returns: True if was stopped successfully, false if had beed already stopped

member.name: E:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.SnmpMessageReceived
member.summary: This event is triggered every time when ANY incoming SNMP message arrives. Note 1. It will be triggered even if OID is not from our scope. Note 2. If there is a specialized event bound to the requested OID, then this event will be triggered after specialized one.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.IsEventHandlerRegistered(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Checks if given object has any subscribtions to 'Requested' event.
member.remarks: can throw FormatException, KeyNotFoundException

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.IsEventHandlerRegisteredByFullOid(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Checks if given object has any subscribtions to 'Requested' event.
member.remarks: can throw KeyNotFoundException

member.summary: Add a handler to 'Requested' event of an object with given oidSuffix.

member.summary: Remove a handler from 'Requested' event of an object with given oidSuffix.

member.summary: Forwards untyped event args to a typed event handler

member.summary: Delete all objects that start with given prefix

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.AssertLeafConsistency(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Checks if object is not created "inside" another object. Leaf of the tree cannot contain other leaves. Folder-node containing object-nodes and other folder-nodes is just an OID metadata and should not have a corresponding object

The type of the value
True to update the object's value

member.remarks: Can throw KeyNotFoundException

member.summary: Gets a value for a given OID
member.param: The full OID of the object you want the value for
True to update the object's value
member.returns: The value of the object
member.remarks: Can throw KeyNotFoundException

member.returns: The value type of the object

member.summary: Get information about a given OID.

True to update the object's value.

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ValueMib2SystemUpTime
member.summary: Time since current process was started in centiseconds. The value is read-only, it cannot be set or overridden by using an event

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ValueIbaSnmpSystemTime
member.summary: System time (returns DateTime.Now.TimeOfDay.ToString()) The value cannot be set, but can be overridden using an event

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ValueIbaProductGeneralVersion
member.summary: Product version in the format "Major.Minor.Sub[aux]", where aux is an optional arbitrary string. Has no public setter. To set it please use .

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.SetValueIbaProductGeneralVersion(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: This function sets the value

member.summary: Dongle hardware id

member.summary: Dongle type

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ValueIbaProductGeneralLicensingSoftwareBuildDate

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ValueIbaProductGeneralLicensingEupDate
member.summary: Date as a string in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD). (The object for this value does NOT exist by default and is created on first set-access to one of the EUP items)

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ValueIbaProductGeneralLicensingEupGracePeriod
member.summary: Number of days as integer. (The object for this value does NOT exist by default and is created on first set-access to one of the EUP items)

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.ValueIbaProductGeneralLicensingEupGracePeriodActive
member.summary: EUP active. (The object for this value does NOT exist by default and is created on first set-access to one of the EUP items)

member.name: F:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp._registeredEnums
member.summary: A dictionary of registered user-defined enum data types

member.name: F:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp._registeredEnumCounter
member.summary: A 'pointer' to the last registered enum data type

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.IsInEnumRegion(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType)
member.summary: Checks whether a given type belongs to the region of user-defined enums. It's not checked whether this type is registered or not.
member.remarks: No search is performed, the check is very fast.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetEnumDataTypeEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an IbaSnmpEnumDataTypeEntry for a given key. Returns null if key was not found.
member.remarks: Search speed is O(n)

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetEnumDataTypeEntry(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType)
member.summary: Gets an IbaSnmpEnumDataTypeEntry for a given key. Returns null if key was not found. Throws ArgumentException if valueType is not from enums region.
member.remarks: Search speed is O(1)

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetEnumDataTypeName(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType)
member.summary: Gets a string name of a user-defined enum. Returns null if there is no such registered enum.
member.remarks: Search speed is O(1)

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetEnumDataTypeCode(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an IbaSnmpValueType of a user-defined enum. Returns IbaSnmpValueType.Unknown if there is no such registered enum.
member.remarks: Search speed is O(n)

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetEnumValueName(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a name of a value of a given enum. Returns null if such enum is not registered or such value does not exist in this enum.
member.param: Registered user-defined enum type
A value in the user-defined enum type
member.remarks: Search speed is O(1) + O(1)

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.RegisterEnumDataType(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Int32,System.String})
member.summary: Registers a user's data type. After registering it can be used as a value type of a user value. MIB description for such values will be generated accordingly.
member.param: Identifies enum. Is case sensitive. Should consist of: {'a-z', 'A-Z', '0-9', '_'} and should start with an uppercase letter. Can start with both uppercase or lowercase letter, (anyway a name in MIB will be equipped with 'IbaEnum' prefix.)
Description of a type in a free format.
A dictionary of all possible values this enum can have. Value names should consist of: {'a-z', 'A-Z', '0-9', '_'} and should start with a lowercase letter.
member.returns: IbaSnmpValueType of the registered type if registering succeeds.
member.remarks: It's recommended to use returned IbaSnmpValueType value in future instead of the name of the enum, as access by IbaSnmpValueType is faster.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.UnregisterEnumDataType(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Unregisters user's enum data type. After this it is impossible to use it with for setting values. If some user values of this type were already created then they should be deleted first.
member.param: The enum data type to be unregisterd.
Makes sense only if values of this type exist. If true, then these objects will be deleted automatically. If false, then InvalidOperationException will be thrown.
member.returns: True on successful unregistering, false if such a type was not registered.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.IsEnumDataTypeRegistered(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType)
member.summary: Checks if a given data type is registered
member.remarks: Search speed is O(1)

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.AssertEnumDataTypeRegistered(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType)
member.summary: Checks if a given data type is registered, and throws ArgumentException if not.
member.remarks: Search speed is O(1)

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetAllRegisteredEnumDataTypes
member.summary: Gets a copy of registered enums dictionary

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.CreateUserValue(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.EventHandler{IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectValueRequestedEventArgs},System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a user value with a given oid suffix. Optionally you can set a 'Requested' event hadler and a tag object. If the value already exists, then ArgumentException will be thown.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.CreateUserValue(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.Object,IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType,System.String,System.String,System.EventHandler{IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectValueRequestedEventArgs},System.Object)

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.DeleteUserValue(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Deletes a user value with given suffix.
member.returns: True on success, false if had been already deleted or not existed
member.remarks: Can rethrow some exceptions from GetFullOidForUserOidSuffix()

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.DeleteAllUserValues
member.summary: Deletes all user-specific values, i.e. object subtree starting with 'OidIbaProductSpecific'

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.DeleteMultipleUserValues(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Deletes a subtree of user values, starting (inclusively) with the given oidPrefix. i.e. 'OidIbaProductSpecific.oidPrefix'. To delete all user values set oidPrefix to null or use DeleteAllUserValues() function.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.SetUserValue(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a user object with a given oid-suffix to a given value. If such an object does not exist, then KeyNotFoundException will be thrown. If a value is of incorrect type, then FormatException will be thown.
member.remarks: Can rethrow some exceptions from GetFullOidForUserOidSuffix()

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.SetUserValue(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a user object with a given oid-suffix to a given value. If such an object does not exist, then KeyNotFoundException will be thrown. If a value is of incorrect type, then FormatException will be thown.

member.remarks: Can rethrow some exceptions from GetFullOidForUserOidSuffix()

member.remarks: Can rethrow some exceptions from GetFullOidForUserOidSuffix()

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetUserValue(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a value and type of an object with a given oid-suffix. If such an object does not exist, then KeyNotFoundException is thrown.
member.remarks: Can rethrow some exceptions from GetFullOidForUserOidSuffix()

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetFullOidForUserOidSuffix(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Returns a full OID for a given user's suffix, like e.g. '{ibaOidPrefix}.{ProductId}.{oidSuffix}'
member.remarks: Can throw InvalidOperationException, ArgumentException, FormatException

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetOidSuffixForFullOid(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Returns an oidSuffix for a given full OID like e.g. '{ibaOidPrefix}.{ProductId}.{oidSuffix}' Returns null if a gieven fullOid is not from user-area address space.
member.remarks: Can throw InvalidOperationException, ArgumentException, FormatException

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.CreateTable(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create an SNMP table. If a table with the same OID already exists then it will throw an ArgumentException.
member.param: The OID suffix for this table. The OidIbaProductSpecific OID will be prepended to it to generate the full OID.
The name of the table. The rules for mib names should be applied (start lower case and only english letters and digits).
The description of the table

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.CreateTableColumn(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.UInt32,IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpValueType,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a column to an existing SNMP table.
member.param: The OID suffix for this table.
The id of this column. This shouldn't be 0. This will be the second to last part of the OID of each cell.
The data type of the column.
The name of the column in the MIB file. It must start with a lowercase letter and only contain english letters and digits.
The description of the column in the MIB file.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.CreateTableRow(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.UInt32,System.Object[],System.EventHandler{IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectValueRequestedEventArgs},System.Object)
member.summary: Add a row to an existing SNMP table. The columns
member.param: The OID suffix for this table.
The id of this row. This will be the last part of the OID of each cell.
The initial data for all the columns. This can be null.
An optional event handler to supply data for the cells.
An optional tag that is sent with the event handler.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.DeleteTableRows(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Delete all table rows of an existing table.
member.param: The OID suffix for this table.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.DeleteTable(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Delete an existing table
member.param: The OID suffix for this table.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.DeleteMultipleTables(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Delete all tables that start with the supplied oidPrefix. If the oidPrefix is null then all tables will be deleted.
member.param: The OID prefix of the tables to delete. This can be null.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.DoesTableExist(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Checks if the table with this OID exists.
member.param: The OID suffix for this table.
member.returns: True in case the table exists.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.LogMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a message to an external Logger if any one is defined (if this.Logger != null)

member.name: F:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp._oidMetadataDict
member.summary: Dictionary of metadata for object-nodes and folder-nodes Can be used by MIB generator (to get descriptions and names) and by GUI (to get captions).

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.SetUserOidMetadata(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets metadata for the given object-node or folder-node within product-specific area. If is not null, then it is checked for compliance with MIB rules. If is used, then it is resolved here. Also a case of the first letter is changed if necessary. Can throw and if is incorrect.
member.param: Oid of the object-node or folder-node within product-specific area; also it is a key for the metadata dictionary

MIB name for the object or "folder". should be an alphanumeric name e.g. "MyName". You can use a wilcard here, then wildcard will be replaced with ancestor's name e.g. "~MyName" -> "parentNameMyName". You can also set it to null, then the name will be generated automatically based on OID.
A short user-friendly name of the object, can be used in e.g. TreeView
member.exception: Thrown when is present (is not ) but has an incorrect value. See for details.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.SetOidMetadata(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.String)
member.summary: Sets metadata for the given object-node or folder-node within any area (not only product-specific area). You can set only Caption here (MIB names and descriptions are predefined by the library). If you want to set metadata for user-specific area, please use a function instead.
member.param: Oid of the object-node or folder-node; also it is a key for the metadata dictionary
A short user-friendly name of the object, can be used in e.g. TreeView

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.SetOidMetadata(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOidMetadata,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set given metadata to 'md.Oid' key

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmp.GetOidMetadata(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Gets a copy of stored metadata of the given node.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified is equal to the current .
member.param: The to compare with the current .
member.returns: true if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid.Equals(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.
member.param: An object to compare with this object.
member.returns: true if the current object is equal to the parameter; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid.Equals(System.IComparable{IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid},IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: The comparison.
member.param: Left object
Right object
member.returns: Returns true if the values of its operands are equal, false otherwise.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid.CompareTo(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid)
member.summary: Compares the current object with another object of the same type.
member.param: An object to compare with this object.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has the following meanings: Less than zero: This object is less than the parameter. Zero: This object is equal to . Greater than zero: This object is greater than .

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.Oid
member.summary: OID

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.OidSuffix
member.summary: Oid suffix for a user object or null if the object is not a user object

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.Tag
member.summary: Tag object with a free access. just stores this tag and does not interact with it anyhow.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.HasEventSubscriptions
member.summary: Tells whether 'Requested' event has any handlers

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.UpdateValue
member.summary: Triggers 'Requested' event in order to allow a user to refresh a value

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.GetSnmpTypedOutput
member.summary: Gets SNMP-representation of an internal value of the object. This function is called after a type check and a check for null, so it is guaranteed, that if this function is called then UntypedValue is of correct type. Highly unprobable concurrency problem (causing an outdating of the type check) is not a big issue, as possible invalid cast exception will be suppressed by the #SNMP library, and SNMP-get operation will just end with a timeout.

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.CheckableValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value also performing type checks beforehand. get: if type is wrong, then null will be returned. set: if type is wrong, then will be thrown.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.CheckTypeAndSetValueSilently(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks type and sets a value. If type is wrong, then no Exception will be generated, and value will be set to null.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.CheckTypeOrNull(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if (value is null) OR (is of correct type).

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpObjectBase.CheckType(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if value is of correct type (i.e. correspond to ValueType)

member.name: T:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpDateTimeTcObject
member.summary: DateTime value binary encoded as "DateAndTime" textual convention (SNMPv2-TC) with DISPLAY-HINT "2d-1d-1d,1d:1d:1d.1d,1a1d:1d"

member.name: T:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpDateTimeStrObject
member.summary: DateTime value as a simple string formatted as yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fff

member.name: T:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpDateStrObject
member.summary: Date value; internally it is a type but time component is ignored; SNMP output is a human-readable string formatted as yyyy-MM-dd (ISO Date format)

member.name: T:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOidObject
member.summary: An OID in "OBJECT IDENTIFIER" syntax. A string containing digits (0-9) and decimal points ('.'). e.g. "1.3.6.1.4.1.311"

member.summary: SNMP v1.

member.summary: SNMP v2 classic.

member.name: F:IbaSnmpLib.VersionCode.V3
member.summary: SNMP v3.

member.name: T:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpRequestIdContainer
member.summary: Is used to retrieve an out parameter from async function

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.TimeoutValue
member.summary: How much time we should wait for send operaion to complete. It is guaranteed that SendFinished event will be fired not later than after this value is elapsed.

member.name: E:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.SendFinished
member.summary: Fired after message send is finished. Contains information about success or failure.

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.DosProtection
member.summary: Dos protection system. Prevents sending too many requests per time period. Is global for all traps and inform messages. Is a readonly instance but can be configured at Runtime as desired.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.AutodetectLocalIp
member.summary: Autodetect local IP and set 'this.LocalIp' value

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.ConfigV1(System.Net.IPEndPoint,System.String,System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Configure trap or inform instance to be used over V1 protocol. Required to be called only once before first call of SendAsync().
member.param: Where to send trap/inform to
Security parameter
Our Local IP, for reciever to know the sender. Can be set to null, then library wil try to autodetect it (recommended for systems with single IP interface).
member.returns: IbaSnmpRetval.Good on success, corresponding value on failure

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.ConfigV2(System.Net.IPEndPoint,System.String,System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Configure trap or inform instance to be used over V2 protocol. Required to be called only once before first call of SendAsync().
member.param: Where to send trap/inform to
Security parameter
Our Local IP, for reciever to know the sender. Can be set to null, then library wil try to autodetect it (recommended for systems with single IP interface).
member.returns: IbaSnmpRetval.Good on success, corresponding value on failure

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.ConfigV3(System.Net.IPEndPoint,IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpUserAccount,System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Configure trap or inform instance to be used over V3 protocol. Required to be called only once before first call of SendAsync().
member.param: Where to send trap/inform to
User account, containing security information
Our Local IP, for reciever to know the sender. Can be set to null, then library wil try to autodetect it (recommended for systems with single IP interface).
member.returns: IbaSnmpRetval.Good on success, corresponding value on failure

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.StartSend(System.Int32,Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.ObjectIdentifier,System.Collections.Generic.List{Lextm.SharpSnmpLib.Variable},System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Creates and starts a task that initiates a send request.

member.summary: Starts send request and generates an exception if operation does not finish within give Timeout.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.WaitForTaskOrThrowTimeout(System.Object)
member.summary: helper function that synchronously waits for a supplied task. It's guaranteed that it will end end not later than within a defined Timeout interval.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.SendAsyncLowLevel(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.String,System.Net.IPEndPoint,IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpRequestIdContainer)
member.summary: Send an inform/trap to specific endpoint using predefined protocol and credentials. To get the result of sending please use one of the following options: 1. subscribe to 'SendFinished' event. 2. await for this function.
member.param: (Actually, this is an OUT parameter) Supply this object if you want to get back a requestId which will be used when sending this request. Previous contents of rc will be ignored and overwritten. Pass null if you're not interested in requestId.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.SendAsync(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.String,System.Net.IPEndPoint,IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpRequestIdContainer)
member.summary: Send an inform/trap to specific endpoint using predefined protocol and credentials. To get the result of sending please use one of the following options: 1. subscribe to 'SendFinished' event. 2. await for this function.
member.param: (Actually, this is an OUT parameter) Supply this object if you want to get back a requestId which will be used when sending this request. Previous contents of rc will be ignored and overwritten. Pass null if you're not interested in requestId.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpNotificationBase.SendAsync(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.String,IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpRequestIdContainer)
member.summary: Send an inform/trap to predefined endpoint using predefined protocol and credentials. To get the result of sending please use one of the following options: 1. subscribe to 'SendFinished' event. 2. await for this function.
member.param: (Actually, this is an OUT parameter) Supply this object if you want to get back a requestId which will be used when sending this request. Previous contents of rc will be ignored and overwritten. Pass null if you're not interested in requestId.

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOidMetadata.MibName
member.summary: OID name or object name for MIB file. You can set it explicitly (e.g. "myFullName") or using a wildcard (e.g. "~MyName"). MIB name is not checked by this class, but there are certain rules for this. Please for details.

member.name: M:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOidMetadata.#ctor(IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOid,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Members are set directly without any checks, though there are some limitations concerning . Please see and for details.
member.param: Is the key id of the metadata dictionary

member.name: P:IbaSnmpLib.IbaSnmpOidMetadata.ParentWildcard
member.summary: A symbol to represent a Wildcard that should be replaced with all the ancestor's names. e.g. name "~Date" will be replaced to e.g. "Job1StatusDate". Wildcard replacement is not done immediately when constructed, but on late stage when (and if) requested.
